item.title: Trump Says SEC Should Require Public Companies to Report Results Every Six Months, Instead of Quarterly
item.description: President Donald Trump is proposing a regulatory change that would affect the Securities and Exchange Commission’s financial reporting requirements for publicly traded companies under federal la
